subject: Marketing
title: Building Genuine Trust
description: Learn Building Genuine Trust in one minute.

hook.text: Patagonia told customers 'Don't buy this jacket.' Sales jumped 30% that year.

buildup.text: In a world of manipulation, radical honesty stands out like a lighthouse.

discovery.text: Trust marketing signals confidence and respect for the audience's intelligence.

twist.text: It requires real sacrificeâ€”admitting flaws, refusing dark patterns, accepting short-term loss.

climax.text: Brands that invest in trust outperform competitors over ten-year periods.

punchline.text: Honesty is the most disruptive marketing strategy.

quiz.question: Why did Patagonia's 'Don't buy this jacket' campaign increase sales?
options: Radical honesty built trust and stood out from competitors
Customers thought the jackets were being discontinued
The campaign was paired with a massive discount
